title: Zeus Jones - cursive - FONT ID
content:
Looking for an ID on the script used for the Zeus Jones logo.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106095100im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Zeus_5998.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Zeus.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106095100/http:/typophile.com/files/Zeus.jpg) | 35.16 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Hello  
Similar with Bickham Script Pro.  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106095100/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
